name: Sumanth Udupi
headline: Bridging Business Strategy and Technical Execution
valueProposition: I am a Business Analyst who thrives at the intersection of process, data, and technology. For clients like Volvo and PACCAR, I've delivered mission-critical EHS and QMS platforms by owning the entire lifecycle: from leading global discovery sessions and authoring precise Gherkin user stories, to validating REST APIs and building the SQL-powered dashboards that prove our impact.
summary: Hello, I'm Sumanth. My career began with a foundation in Mechanical Engineering, but a passion for the systems that govern our world—and the data that explains them—led me to Business Analysis. I believe the most elegant solutions are born from a deep understanding of the problem, and I thrive on diving into complex domains like Environmental, Health, and Safety (EHS) and automotive compliance to build software that is not only functional but transformative.

My approach is built on a simple philosophy: clarity is kindness. Whether I'm writing a Gherkin user story, documenting an OpenAPI specification, or prototyping a workflow in Figma, my goal is to create a single source of truth that empowers developers to build with confidence and stakeholders to feel understood. I love leading Agile ceremonies because they are about collaboration and shared ownership, turning a roadmap into reality one sprint at a time.

I'm driven by a curiosity to see how data can tell a story, whether it's uncovering ad patterns at Amazon or building Superset dashboards to track EHS tool adoption at Volvo. This data-first mindset, combined with my recent certifications in UX Design and Machine Learning, informs my work as I seek to build not just what is asked for, but what is needed.

My background in Mechanical Engineering taught me to see everything as a system. Today, I apply that same thinking to software, deconstructing complex business processes into their component parts to build more efficient and reliable solutions.
targetAudience: I am passionate about solving complex challenges in the enterprise software space and am actively seeking collaborations with innovative teams in the ESG, EHS, and manufacturing sectors.
